subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Florentino Perez, the Real Madrid president, has finally seen his club win another Champions League title. His next task is to make sure the franchise wins it again, for the 11th time.
snippet: Florentino Perez, the Real Madrid president, has finally seen his club win another Champions League title. His next task is to make sure the franchise wins it again, for the 11th time.
